text: Rick’s ship flies through space.
Learning to fly this thing, Morty, is gonna be really liberating. INT. RICK’S SHIP - SPACE RICK, MORTY, and JERRY are flying through space. Jerry is the backseat. Rick is in the passenger seat.
You know, y-y-you’re gonna be free to go on all kinds of errands for me.
Cool.
See that planet right there? Don’t fly too close to that planet, someone will come out and try to wash your windshield. We hear an old Nokia-style ringtone of “Back That Azz Up.
Hold on. (answering phone, sketchy) Yeah. Yeah, I have it. Where do you want to meet? Alright, cool. He hangs up, excited.
Alright, Morty, lesson’s over. We got some business to attend to a few light minutes south of here.
Oh, you still use “south” in space. 6A Rick SCREAMS in shock.
Whoa, Jesus, Jerry, what the hell are you doing here?
What are you talking about, we agreed a boy’s father should be present when he’s learning to drive.
I guess I remember that. Wow, and you've just been back there this whole time? Amazing. (checks watch) Well we don’t have time to take him to Earth, Morty. W- head for 3924917.
Cool, haha! Looks like I’m coming along for an adventure. RICK ll Yyyyep.-
Rick’s ship arrives at some empty stretch of space.
This is where we're going?
Nope. An asteroid covered with the futuristic alien equivalent strip mall shimmers into existence and narrowly misses th as it soars by. Dumpy bus-looking spaceships and other cr soar away from it.
This is. You can park in a handicap spot, Morty. Anything with less than eight limbs is considered disabled here.

Rick, Jerry, and Morty enter this strip mall lobby that f like a low-budget animal hospital or car rental. Rick nod a REPTILIAN CLERK behind the counter, who slides a clipbo to him, which he starts filling out. HELEN, a large, motherly reptilian, approaches Jerry.
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 3.
Well, look at this fella! Aren’t you handsome.
Thank you. I’m Jerry.
Oh I know you are. Did you come here in a spaceship? She escorts him out of the room.
Jerry is flattered by the attention.
I’m traveling with my son and father-in-law - w-wait, are they coming?
Oh they’11 be back soon.
What? She opens a door and ushers him through.
Jerry enters a room containing DOZENS OF JERRYS. Some are sleeping, most of them are walking around aimlessly sayin things like “excuse me” and “can I get some help here?”
What the hell? ANOTHER JERRY standing nearby turns to our Jerry.
(sharing his outrage) I know, right? YET ANOTHER JERRY is ushered into the room by another reptilian. That Jerry looks around.
Oh, what the hell? Our Jerry looks at him.
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 4.
I know, right?
Rick continues filling out the forms on the clipboard. Mo is looking at displayed literature for this place, which apparently called:
“Jerryboree?” You created a daycare for my dad?
Are you kidding, I wish I had this idea. Well, I did have this idea, but I wish I was the version of me that owned it. That guy’s rich.

Don’t forget to check the reason for your drop off. We see the form Rick’s filling out includes options like “Earth under siege” and “threatened to tell Beth.” We catch another glimpse of the form Rick’s filling out, which contains an outline of a Jerry where you can indica existing physical Jerry damage. There’s two options for length of stay: “unknown” and “forever.”

Trust me, Morty, I’ve heard stories from other Ricks. Jerrys don’t tend to last five minutes off of Earth. Here they can romp and play with other Jerrys and this is a totally unregistered cross-temporal asteroid, he couldn't be safer. (hands Morty a scrap) Hey, Morty, hang on to this. That number is your Dad. If you lose it, we're not gonna be able to get him back.
Rick’s ship soars in and nearly hits several better-looki spaceships while parking.  “MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14)
Okay, wait here.
I want to come with.
Don’t come with, it’s boring, it’s- (BURP) it’s business stuff.
What kind of business do you do in a garage? You know this seems a little shady.

Right, yeah, like nothing shady ever happened in a fully furnished office? You ever hear about Wall Street, Morty? Y-y-y-you know what those guys do in a- in th- in their fancy board rooms? They take their balls and they dip them in cocaine and wipe them all over each other. You know, grandpa goes around and he does his business in public because grandpa isn’t shady. KROMBOPULOS MICHAEL, a tough-looking creature, appears at Rick’s window and taps on the glass.
Ah, crap. (rolling down window) Hey, what’s up?
Hey, Rick! (holds up a bag) Haha, here you go, three thousand flerbos. Do you have the weapon?
(embarrassed) C-can we please - this is my grandson, Morty.
Well hi, Morty! I’m Krombopulos Michael, I’m an assassin, I buy guns from your grandpa! 32 33 34 35 36 37 38 39 40
Ugh. Unbelievable. (hands out a case) Here. Go away. Michael opens the case and brandishes a sinister looking gun.

Ooooh, yeah, this looks deadly. So this shoots anti-matter? My target can’t be killed with regular matter. Nice to meet you, Morty. (offers card) Listen, if you ever need anybody murdered please give me a call. I’m very discreet, I have no code of ethics, I will kill anyone anywhere. Children, animals, old people, it doesn’t matter. I just love killin’.

You're g- you’re giving him a card?! Morty takes Michael’s card. It’s a high-tech holographic displaying Michael’s smiling face, his dynamically update coordinates and, of course, “Krombopulos Michael, Killer. Michael walks away, leaving Morty and Rick in silence for beat.
You sell weapons to killers? For money? The camera slowly pushes into Rick’s face as if Morty, an the audience, is about to learn the most epic truth revea in the show thus far.

Ugh, you’ve got what the intergalactic call a very planetary mindset, Morty. It’s more complicated out here, this isn’t “money,” these are flerbos. Do you understand what two humans can accomplish with three thousand of these?
Uh, what?
An entire afternoon at BLIPS AND
We ZOOM INTO his happy mouth, and when we zoom out we’re
An intergalactic arcade with all the coolest games and ea
Oh, this place is the best, it’s got beer, games, prizes, and you can never tell what time it is. They walk past a bank of gaming machines.
You sold a gun to a murderer so you could play video games?

Yeah sure, I mean if you spend all day shuffling words around you can make anything sound bad, Morty. Here, check this out. Rick slaps a helmet from one of the machines onto Morty’s head and inserts a flerbo. Morty’s eyes roll back.
52A ROY, a twelve year old boy, wakes with a start. His M sitting on the edge of the bed.
Ah!
Roy, what’s wrong?
I had a nightmare. I was with an old man. He put a helmet on me...
It’s just a fever. Get some sleep, I don’t want you missing school on Monday.
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 8.
Roy studies a textbook while we hear a TEACHER instructin
I want you kids to look around you today and think about your future. Roy looks out the window at kids playing football.
Now is the time in your life when anything is possible. We zoom in on the spiraling football. The football is cau by a twenty year old Roy as a stadium cheers. He runs.
Spiraling perfectly it’s gonna be caught by Roy Parsons. Roy Parsons is at the twenty, now he’s at the

head_text.subj: TEN, NOTHING CAN STOP ROY THE

text: Roy catches the eye of RHONDA, a bookish girl in the crow They smile at each other. We dissolve on Rhonda’s face to
Thirty year old Rhonda in a modest home addresses a thirt year old Roy across the dinner table as their eight year son picks at his food.
I just think it’s time to get realistic. Have you talked to my father about the carpet store? Roy?

Forty year old Roy takes inventory in a carpet store. He sighs. It’s a living. His phone rings. He looks at it. The caller ID reads “Doctor Schmidt.” INT. DOCTOR’S OFFICE - DAY DOCTOR SCHMIDT somberly explains test results to Roy.
Had we caught it sooner... well, hindsight is twenty twenty, Roy, what’s important is that we move quickly.
A forty eight year old, emaciated Roy is in a hospital be Rhonda holds his hand.
I’m not ready to die.
You're not going to.
62A Roy is wheeled into his house. His family cheers from a table with a cake, under a banner that says “CANCER CAN STOP THE ROCKET.” It’s a jubilant scene.
Roy is fifty five now. He pleasantly shakes hands with a satisfied CUSTOMER.
Hey thanks for the carpet, Roy. Roy watches the customer go, then turns to look at his de There’s a trophy with a football on it that says “World’s Greatest Dad.” Roy smiles to himself.

Hey Roy, you pull those Persian off- white shags for the clearance sale? 64A Roy goes to a step ladder and starts struggling with of carpet. He loses his balance, falls off the ladder and breaks his neck. His eyes roll back into his head.
Whoa, sh- shiiit! Agh. The words “GAME OVER” appear over his death in spooky fon
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 10.
Morty’s eyes roll back down and he rips the helmet off hi head in shock, looking around.
Hoh, what the hell?! W-w-where am I? What in the hell?! Rick has been drinking his beer and watching the screen o Morty’s machine, which we now see is a game called “Roy: Life Well Lived.”
(examining screen) Fifty five years. Not bad, Morty. Y- you kind of wasted your thirties though with that whole “bird watching” phase.
W-where- where’s my wife?
Morty, you were just playing a game. It’s called Roy. Snap out of it. Come on. Rick grabs tickets from the machine, hands them to Morty takes the helmet.
(remembering) I’m Morty. You're Rick. (back to himself) Hey! You sold a gun to a guy that kills people!
Look at this... (re: screen) You beat cancer, and then you went back to work at the carpet store? Boo.
D-don’t dodge the issue, Rick! Selling a gun to a hitman is the same as pulling the trigger!
It’s also the same as doing nothing. (MORE )
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 11.
If Krombopulos Michael wants someone dead, there’s not a lot anyone can do to stop him, that’s why he does it for a living. (putting on helmet) Now excuse me, it’s time to thrash your Roy score.
You know, you could stop this killing from happening, Rick. You know, y-you did a bad thing selling that gun but you could undo it if you wanted.

(half concentrating) Uh huh. Yeah that’s the difference between you and me, Morty. I never go back to the carpet store. Rick fully concentrates on the game. A passing RANDOM ALI notices Rick’s skills.
Holy shit, this guy’s taking Roy off the grid! (calling out) This guy doesn’t have a social security number for Roy! A small crowd gathers around the machine. Morty fumes for beat, then storms off.
Jerry, upset, talks to Helen at the front desk.
Hi, I’m sorry, I think there was a misunderstanding. I’m an adult and would like to go home, please.
Well of course, right through that tube. Jerry looks around annoyed, but still enters the tube.
Unbelievable.
You're doing great!

(indignant) I know how to crawl in a tube. (crawling) Ah, come on. Uch, this is harder than it looks. (Jerry does not know how to crawl through a tube). As he through, we now see a huge room with tons of these tubes. Jerry keeps crawling and reaches a slide.
Whooooa! He curls around and then flies out into:
Other Jerrys are having fun in the ball pit. The ENTIRE R is decorated like a play version of Morty’s home.
You guys are enjoying this? Don’t you feel a little patronized?
How so? Just then an alien dressed in a large, PLUSHY BETH costum comes in.
Jeerrrrry!
Oh come on, this is ridiculous.
I love you, Jerry!
(melting) Awww, Beeeth!
Who wants to come watch Midnight Run with director’s commentary on?
Yeah! / Definitely! / Yes!
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 13.
First one there gets to adjust the picture settings!
(immediately turned) The factory tint setting is always too high! Out of my way! Jerry, now excited, chases Plushy Beth with all the other
- tint setting is always too high!
Jerry watches Midnight Run with Plushy Beth and tons of o Jerrys there, too. He rests his head on her shoulder.
Krombopulos Michael, geared up like a Navy Seal, goes thr a spiritual ritual. He takes a locket, wraps it ina handkerchief, and kisses it.
Oh boy, here I go killing again. As cool HEIST MUSIC plays...

- Krombopulos, with highly trained precision, crawls thro a vent, drops on a guard, and puts him in a sleeper hold. - Krombopulos hugs a wall, eyes two security cameras, ski by without them seeing, and sleeper holds a guard with hi feet. - Krombopulos monkey bars on pipes down in the sewer, cut hole out of a ceiling above him, a guy falls through. He catches him, sleeper holds him, then places him down gent - Through one final sequence, he takes an unconscious gua finger, places it on a scanner, the guard wakes up and he sleeper holds him again, then opens a secure door to:
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 14.

KOOF (a glowing gaseous cloud of light) hovers in the cen of a small holding cell, the “bars” of which are rays of kind. Krombopulos enters and produces the sinister weapon Rick made. He levels it on the gaseous cloud. Rick’s ship smashes through the wall and into the room exactly where Michael was standing, obliterating Michael burying itself halfway into the floor.
Krombopulos Michael’s business card is on the dashboard. the sounds of leaking steam and falling debris is the sou of the ship’s navigation system:
You, have, arrived at... (splice) Krombopulos Michael. Your destination is below. Morty is slumped over the steering wheel of the craft, knocked out from the impact. He slowly regains consciousn
(dazed) We're all out of off-white Persian.
Morty exits the vehicle, looking around. Among the debris finds Michael’s arm, still holding the gun.
Aw, man. W-w-w-what have I done?
Drop the gun! A guard with a laser rifle has the drop on Morty. Morty doesn’t know what to do.
Y-you don’t understand. (points to Krombopulos) This guy was gonna kill someone.
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 15.

(raises his gun) I guess that makes two of us. Hurgh! A Rick portal appears in the middle of the guard’s body, splitting him down the center like a knife splitting a pi of fruit. The front of his body falls forward, the back f backward, leaving two even slices of guard on the floor a Rick steps through the portal onto the front half.
What are you doing, Morty? This is a Galactic Federation outpost! Look, I don’t have time to tell you my entire backstory but you need to understand that Grandpa and government don’t get along.
He saved my life. Rick and Morty are startled that the imprisoned cloud is speaking.
What?
Huh? Whoa! Are you Krombopulos Michael’s target? W-w-w-what’s your name?
My kind has no use for names. I communicate through what you call Jessica’s feet. No. Telepathy.
Oh, good job, Morty. Y-y-you- you killed my best customer but you saved a mind-reading fart.

I like this name, “Fart.” Morty, would you kindly release me by pulling that lever to the left of my cell? I am in great pain. Morty pulls the lever next to the cell, deactivating its laser bars. An ALARM sounds.
Oh crap. Let’s get you out of here.
We can’t get him out of here. He’s gaseous, he’s not gonna make it through a portal, Morty.
Well then I guess we’re all getting in the car. Right, uh...
Fart.
No! Just- j-j-just get in the car. Morty opens the door to Rick’s ship. Koof floats in.
Morty, come on. W- I wanna go back to Blips and Chitz. I don’t wanna deal with this.
Rick, you've been clear on the fact that you don’t wanna help, so just go away.
More are coming. Rick hears more guards coming.
Screw this. I’m out. 114A Rick goes back through a portal, which disappears. M stunned for a moment, then shakes it off and tries to sta the ship. He can’t.
Ohhh. Come on, come on! Several guards show up.
Get out of the vehicle made of garbage or we will open fire!
Um um um um. Morty keeps trying to start the ship.

Open fire! A portal opens in the ceiling above them and a solid, six foot diameter torrent of sea water quickly fills up the r 119A Morty watches as the guards float around outside the ship, panicking. 119B Another portal opens in the floor beneath them and t quickly drains of water, taking all the guards with it as they’re being sucked down a drain. That portal closes before a third opens and Rick walks through. INT. RICK’S SHIP - CONTINUOUS 119¢ Rick climbs in, shoving Morty over.

Stupid ass fart saving carpet store motherfucker. Move. Rick tries the ship’s controls. RICK (CONT’D) 121 Wait, did you fuck with my seat settings? A long beat as Rick moves the seat forward and back as mo guards close in.
More are coming.
Rick!
Yeah, yeah. With difficulty, the ship crushes the guards and exits through the hole whence it came or whatever Shakespeare w say.
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 18.
We land on a particular business: Cogspot.
Morty, Rick, and Koof are in a cluttered mechanic’s garag GEARHEAD is working on Rick’s battered ship.
Your geldon converter is pretty dinged up.
That’s because my grandson drives like a male Obravadian. Yeah I said it. Some stereotypes are based in fact.
Actually it’s because of years of neglect. You really need to respect your gears, Rick. To you they’re just wheels with teeth, but in my culture, wars have been fought. Entire--
So I’ve heard. Just fix it. Rick walks over to Morty and Koof.

I don’t think the Gromflamites can track us now but it looks like we're gonna be here for a while. (takes Morty aside) Or, you know, if you still have the gun K. Michael dropped we could finish the job and go home.
You do understand I’m telepathic, right?
I’m being polite.
Rick, we're taking him back where he belongs.
Oh yeah, where’s that? (BURP) Are you going on a quest to find He Who Smelt It?
I came here accidentally through a wormhole located in what you call get out of my head, Fart, I know you're in here. Lalalala. No. In what you call the Promethean Nebula.
Oh great, just a hop skip and an eight hundred light year jump.
You know you can leave any time you want, Rick. 138A Rick mutters and walks off.
Whatever you wanna do you little punk ass little bitch. I’m gonna go to Blips and Chitz.
Thank you, Morty. You are not like other carbon-based life forms. You put the value of all life above your own.
It’s how things should be. I-it’s how they could be.
I could not agree more. (singing) The worlds can be one together... Morty gets a strange, entranced look on his face. Bowie-style tune begins. We enter:
139 140 141 As a David Koof flies Morty through space in their shared imaginatio
Cosmos without hatred. Stars like diamonds in your eyes. Morty flies through a cosmic void. Surreal images blur an transform into each other.

The ground can be space (space Space space space), With feet marching towards a peaceful sky. All the moon men want things their way, But we make sure they see the sun. Goodbye, moon men. You say: Moon men wave goodbye.
Goodbye, moon men. Morty and Koof float away from the moon men.
Goodbye--
Shut the fuck up about moon men!
Rick is yelling at them while shaking a cane.
This isn’t a musical number, this is a fucking operation. We gotta be cool and fucking lay low. Morty looks embarrassed.
147A Jerry sits at a computer, GIGGLING. On screen: we se email subject: “FWD: FWD: FUNNY! MUSLIM & A DUCK GO GOLFI He clicks “FORWARD.” A Jerry next to him LAUGHS.
Duck duck birdie! Very funny.
148A PAN OUT to see a row of Jerrys at these computers, w some clicks, then GIGGLES. Jerry takes a sip of iced tea.
Here comes another funny. He sends another email.
(laughs ) Oh this place is great.
I almost wish I could stay longer than one day.
You just might.
W-what do you mean?
Other Jerry leads Jerry into a wing of wounded, abandoned jaded Jerrys. One has a buzz cut, one wears a tank top, e
These are the Jerrys whose Ricks and Mortys never came back. They live here now. 152A/B Our Jerry gets nervous. He shudders.
Rick is watching Ball Fondlers on TV. A breaking news report comes in.
No gear-turnings as of yet in the curious case of these unidentified humanoid fugitives, reportedly at large somewhere within the Gear System. Security camera images of Rick and Morty on the screen.
Son of a...
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 22. Rick storms up to Morty and Koof.
Why were the Gromflamites holding you prisoner? What the fuck is so valuable about you?

I am no more valuable than life itself. However I am able to alter the composition of atoms, like this: Koof's cloud pulses with electrical arcs and cycles throu various colors before dropping a lump of gold on the floo
That was oxygen. I added seventy one protons to it.

Oh terrific. No wonder every cop in the system is looking for us. Any species that gets a hold of this thing is gonna use it to take over the galaxy. You know how inconvenient that’s gonna be to my work? A sound prompts Rick to go to a window. Government ships are hovering outside the garage.
Somebody dropped the dime on us. (realizing) Gearhead. Rick turns to Gearhead, who is holding a gear gun on them
I’m sorry, Rick. The reward on your head is too high. And like you always say, you gotta look out for number one.
Number one is ME, asshole! You’re supposed to be my friend!
Friend? Do you even know my real name? It’s Revolio Clockberg Junior. (MORE )
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 23.
I belong to an entire species of Gear People. Calling me Gearhead is like calling a Chinese person Asia Face. Rick spies an open box full of twigs. He grabs a handful throws them at Gearhead.

No! Not twigs! The twigs get stuck in the gears on Gearhead’s head, caus them to jam. Horrible sounds come from his interior. He d his gun and tries to get the twigs out. Rick runs up to Gearhead, grabs one of his arms and twist in a deliberate fashion. The small double hatch on Gearhead’s crotch slides open. reaches in through the hatch and pulls out two small gear Gearhead lets out a high pitched shriek. Rick grabs two o the gears on Gearhead’s mouth, pulls them off as well, th replaces them with the gears from Gearhead’s crotch. Gear makes horrible sounds and falls to his knees in shock.

Two things I want to make clear to everybody in this room: Never betray me and it’s time to go. Rick, Morty, and Koof jump in Rick’s ship. It takes off through a nearby window. Two GEAR COPS run in with weapons.
Nobody move! Gearhead has gotten to his feet and stumbles over to the cops, making horrible muffled sounds, pointing at his fac
Oh my GOD! Are those-- Both gear cops start gagging. Maybe they puke but I don’t know what gear people vomit.
Rick’s ship flies through a densely populated alley: vend peddle gear wares, an old gear woman wearing a babushka f the dust of a dirty gear out a window, children do playfu gear-related things.

“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 24. Two government motorcycle ships give pursuit and open fir them. Rick shoots one of the aliens off its motorcycle. The oth crashes into a parked gear car.
Hey, Morty, remember when you said selling a gun was as bad as pulling the trigger? How do you feel about all these people that are getting killed today because of your choices?
I did the right thing, Rick!
Tell that to Gearhead’s gearsticles!
You did that!
Wrong, I'd be playing Roy right now, at a certain point my hands are tied, Morty! 171 172 173 174 175 Rick and Morty take a hard right, where two more ships st chasing and shooting at them.
Jerry is with the Lost Jerrys, playing poker.
I can’t believe Rick did this. This is the eighth to the last straw!
Ante up.
Ya know what? Screw it. I have a better gamble for you guys. I say we escape.
If you want to leave you can just go out the front door. 176 177 178 181
You think we’re kept here against our will? That would be illegal.
But if you can leave, then why are you still here?
Same reason as you. We’re Jerrys. 184A Jerry is offended by that, and stands up.
Jerry marches past Helen.
I'm leaving!

Okay then! That was always allowed! INT. RICK’S SHIP - LATER Rick and Morty have three ships on their tail now. Rick puts on the brakes and the ships fly by. Rick shoots them and the ships crash. Now, WAY MORE people and bigger ships start pursuing them
Morty, take the wheel! Morty takes the wheel as Rick shoots at people.
Whoa!! 188A Morty jerks the wheel and Rick falls over.
Whoa! Jeez dammit, Morty, who taught you to fly this thing? Hahaha I’m kidding I know that’s on me.
Um, Rick? We see a HUGE ship has blocked them and they are surround
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 26.
Shit. Well, I guess this is it.
Morty, crack the window. Morty does so. Koof floats out.
An alien cop is seated behind the flight stick of his squ craft. He doesn’t see Koof float into the back seat behin him.
I wonder why Greg is always so critical of my girlfriend?
(shrug) Well, he’d probably like to have me to himself, that’s how friends are.
Or does he want her to himself. The cop gets a weird look on his face. Koof surrounds him
A gear man is having sex with a gear woman. The cop and K watch from the doorway.
(singing) The worlds can be one together. Cosmos without hatred. Stars like diamonds in your eyes.
My life is a fucking joke. He steers his ship into one of the larger ships, causing both to explode.
(singing) Goodbye, moon men. You say goodbye, moon men. (MORE )
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 27.
Goodbye, moon men. Oh goodbye. Those explosions cause a chain reaction of others, sendin smaller craft spiraling into nearby buildings, which collapse.
After all of it is done, Koof floats back in through Mort window.
Alright, let's proceed.
Damn. Can’t blame that on the dog. Talk about silent but deadly! I’m- I-I’ve seen some nerve gas but that- that g- this gas got NERVE. Haha, you know what I’m sayin’?
Are you done?

I‘1l let you know, Morty. Gone with the Wind, am I right? If you don’t like that one, Morty, an alt on that could be, like, if I said “Gasablanca.” All right, I’m done. Let’s get to the Promethean Nebula so my grandson can finish saving a life!
Jerry wanders, timidly, into a busy interstellar mass tra station. He goes up to a booth.
Glagga blag blag?
Um... Earth, please? She stamps something and hands it to him.
Is this-- Do I pay?
Agga blag blag blag!
Agga blag! / Wagga baag! / Ag blag!
I'm sorry! Sorry! Jerry, scared, runs out.
Jerry exits and walks by a creepy homeless octopus and a feral stray alien animal.
Hey. Its face expands out and it screams. Jerry runs away. He walks down an alley and runs into an alien.
Gagga blag blag. Agga blag. Agga blag.
Oh, uh... hey, what? I don’t- Uh, what do you want?

Agga blag bla-- The alien explodes, covering Jerry in green goop. Two smaller aliens approach Jerry and fill cups with the goop. He runs away. They each take a drink. Jerry sees a giant horrifying alien and runs away from it
Jerry sits on an alien bus stop, trying to look confident the sights and sounds of the alien city whiz by all aroun him.
Jerry comes through the entrance, looking at the floor as heads through the double doors.
“MORTY-NIGHT RUN" FINAL ANIMATIC DRAFT (9/8/14) 29.
The Lost Jerrys are working on an entertainment center. J skulks up, ashamed.
Hey, are you the one that left? Jerry nods. TANK TOP WEARING JERRY (CONT’D) I get it, it’s a- it’s a hassle out there.
Right? I mean, who needs that?
Right? I mean, who needs that? PAUL FLEISCHMAN, a Jewy man in his early 40s approaches.
Hahoh, not us.
Uh, who are you?
Oh. Excuse me. (extends hand) Paul Fleischman. Infinite timelines. In some of them Beth re- marries.
Jeez.

Don’t worry, I treat Beth very well and I do not overstep my bounds with Morty. Every kid needs a dad but there’s no replacing you. Hey, you wanna give us a hand with this? We're trying to figure out how to get the sound coming through the stereo instead of the TV. I- I- I don’t- it’s very difficult.
